adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Chair
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this traditional style Adirondack chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The classic Adirondack design has a timeless appeal. The flat arms double as miniature side tables for resting your refreshments. 

There is an interesting history to these chairs, the design having originated in the early 1900s in the Adirondack Hills, New York State. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Adirondack chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. The Adirondack Stool / Coffee table is another wonderful addition to match perfectly with your chairs.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Rocking Chair
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
More than just an Adirondack chair, this one rocks! It is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. 

Based on the classic Adirondack design, it makes a perfect partner piece for our standard Adirondack Chair. The Adirondack Stool / Coffee table pictured is another wonderful addition to match perfectly with your rocking chair.

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Adirondack chair all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Cushion
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke cushion perfectly designed to fit both the Adirondack Chair and Adirondack Rocking Chair.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Footrest
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
This is the optional footrest for our Adirondack Chair. Traditionally, it is also known as a steamer piece. Put your feet up and enjoy your moment in the sun.

The footrest has 2 positions, almost horizontal or downwards sloping offering extra support and comfort whilst relaxing in your Adirondack chair.

Please note that this footrest is not suitable for use with the Adirondack rocking chair.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Shelf
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
The Adirondack Shelf comfortably rests on the two arms of the Adirondack Static or Adirondack Rocking Chair.

The two adjustable extending wings allow the piece to lay completely flat or with a small incline. An ideal table for snacks and drinks when flat or using the extendable wings to create a sloping laptop/tablet or reading base.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Clara Coffee Table
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
With its curved edge design, our Clara coffee table compliments many of the products in the Pepe range. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Adirondack Stool / Coffee Table
adirondack-chair-collection.Body: The perfect accompanying accessory for the Adirondack Chair Collection, this adaptable piece can either be used as a coffee table or a foot stool.

adirondack-chair-collection.Name: Cover for Adirondack Chair
adirondack-chair-collection.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Adirondack Chair.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

all-chairs.Name: Steamer Attachment for Elli Chair
all-chairs.Body:
This is the optional footrest for our Elli Chair. Traditionally, it is also known as a steamer piece. Put your feet up and enjoy your moment in the sun.

The footrest can be fitted at a slope to lightly support your legs, or raised using it’s flip-legs to transform the chair into a full recliner.

all-chairs.Name: Elli Chair - Static Model
all-chairs.Body:
This traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors.  The classic design has a timeless appeal. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. 

This model can be used in conjunction with the Carita Bridge, between 2 chairs to make an outdoor loveseat.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

all-chairs.Name: Elli Chair with Flipleg
all-chairs.Body:
This traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors.  The classic design has a timeless appeal. The 'flip-leg' feature provides for two seating positions. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair, while the reclined position is more suitable for sitting back in the sunshine. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

all-chairs.Name: Elli High Back Chair with Flip Leg
all-chairs.Body:
This high back version of our traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The classic design has a timeless appeal. The 'flip-leg' feature provides for two seating positions. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair, while the reclined position is more suitable for sitting back in the sunshine. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. 

The pictures show the chair being used with the Carita Bridge, which may be purchased separately.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

all-chairs.Name: Adirondack Chair
all-chairs.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this traditional style Adirondack chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The classic Adirondack design has a timeless appeal. The flat arms double as miniature side tables for resting your refreshments. 

There is an interesting history to these chairs, the design having originated in the early 1900s in the Adirondack Hills, New York State.

all-chairs.Name: Viking Chair
all-chairs.Body:
This unique take on a simplistic concept, the Pepe Viking chair is a vision of design and practicality.

This versatile little chair is, to our mind, a design classic. Also known as a stargazer chair due to the angle and length of the back, the chair really supports your neck while you look up at the stars! The unique and simple design consists of just two pieces, a backrest, and another smaller piece that slides through the back rest and acts as a seat. 

Easily manoeuvrable and convenient for storing, the Viking chair is a flawless balance between design and practicality.

all-chairs.Name: Adirondack Rocking Chair
all-chairs.Body:
More than just an Adirondack chair, this one rocks! It is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. 

Based on the classic Adirondack design, it makes a perfect partner piece for our standard Adirondack Chair. The Adirondack Stool / Coffee table pictured is another wonderful addition to match perfectly with your rocking chair.

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Adirondack chair all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Pirkho Table / Footstool
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
The Pirkho Table / Footstool has many uses, it can be used as a footstool, side table, or even as additional seating.  With its curved edge design, our Pirkho table compliments many of the products in the Pepe range.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Rosa Table
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body: The Rosa Table is a unique, smaller style bistro table solidly constructed from Scandinavian Redwood.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Amelia Square Table 100 cm x 100 cm
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia square outdoor dining table. This table is also available as a set to include 2 Elli Chairs.

The Amelia table has a 50mm hole in the centre for use with or without a parasol. 

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Amelia Rectangular Table 145 x 100 cm
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia rectangular outdoor dining table.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This table may be extended with our optional party tops to provide seating for up to ten people. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Extending Oval Party Tops for Amelia 145 x 100 cm Table
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Make the most of those large group gatherings by extending your Amelia 145cm x 100cm into a large extended dining table, generous enough to accommodate 10-12 people. 

These Extending Oval Party Tops slide on in such a way as to add the three extra seats at each end but without any obstruction from table legs and can be easily removed and stored when not in use. 

This really is the most exquisite design for social outdoor dining. Made from Scandinavian Redwood, this beautifully made item of outdoor furniture is a real standout piece.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Margot 127cm Round Table
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Sit down for a lovely outdoor meal with our classic Margot outdoor dining table. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Amelia Rectangular Table 207 x 100 cm
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia rectangular outdoor dining table. This is the largest of our outdoor dining tables, the Amelia rectangular table will give your garden a modern boost thanks to the sleek form of its slatted Redwood. The table itself has a removable central hole (50mm) for use with or without a parasol.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Sunshine 100 cm Round Table
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
Sit down for a lovely outdoor meal with our Sunshine outdoor dining table.

With its sunray design and intertwining legs, this occasional table is compact and delicate.

Comfortably seating 2 to 3 people, the sunshine table balances design and practicality for an aesthetic outdoor dining table. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Body: The perfect accompanying accessory for the Adirondack Chair Collection, this adaptable piece can either be used as a coffee table or a foot stool.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Birgitta Bar Bistro Table
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
New for 2023, we introduce the Birgitta Bar Table.  Enjoy dining outdoors or sit together for an evening drink in the sunshine. The Birgitta table is usually matched with our Birgit stools (see Bistro Tables Collection) but we offer here for those who may already own suitable stools or high chairs.

The table will accommodate six for drinks.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal.

 Some easy assembly is necessary.

This table set can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

outdoor-wooden-tables.Name: Amelia Rectangular Table 168 cm x 100 cm
outdoor-wooden-tables.Body:
This 168 cm x 100 cm Amelia table is a new edition - pictures to follow.

At a length of 168 cm, this table can comfortably fit 6 of our Elli chairs, with the pairs on the long side clear of the legs.

Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia rectangular outdoor dining table.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

This set comprises the 1 x 1 m table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The Amelia table has a 50mm hole in the centre for use with or without a parasol.

amelia-tables.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia rectangular outdoor dining table.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints.

amelia-tables.Name: Amelia Rectangular Table 207 x 100 cm
amelia-tables.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia rectangular outdoor dining table. This is the largest of our outdoor dining tables, the Amelia rectangular table will give your garden a modern boost thanks to the sleek form of its slatted Redwood. The table itself has a removable central hole (50mm) for use with or without a parasol.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

amelia-tables.Name: Extending Oval Party Tops for Amelia 145 x 100 cm Table
amelia-tables.Body:
Make the most of those large group gatherings by extending your Amelia 145cm x 100cm into a large extended dining table, generous enough to accommodate 10-12 people. 

These Extending Oval Party Tops slide on in such a way as to add the three extra seats at each end but without any obstruction from table legs and can be easily removed and stored when not in use. 

This really is the most exquisite design for social outdoor dining. Made from Scandinavian Redwood, this beautifully made item of outdoor furniture is a real standout piece.

amelia-tables.Name: Cover for Amelia 100 Table
amelia-tables.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Amelia 100 Table.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

Note that the pictures below are actually of our larger Amelia 145 Table - the principle is the same.

bistro-table-sets.Name: Birgitta 2 Person Bistro Set
bistro-table-sets.Body:
New for 2023, we introduce the Birgitta 2 person Bistro Set, comprising the Birgitta table plus two Birgit stools. Enjoy dining outdoors or sit together for an evening drink in the sunshine. Additional stools can be purchased separately - the table will in fact accommodate six for drinks.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal.

 Some easy assembly is necessary.

This table set can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

bistro-table-sets.Name: Birgitta 4 Person Bistro Set
bistro-table-sets.Body:
New for 2023, we introduce the Birgitta 4 person Bistro Set, comprising the Birgitta table plus four Birgit stools. Enjoy dining outdoors or sit together for an evening drink in the sunshine.

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

bistro-table-sets.Name: Rosa Table plus 2 Viking Chairs
bistro-table-sets.Body: The Rosa Table bistro set might be compact but is full of unique design with striking Viking chairs.

bistro-table-sets.Name: Sunshine 100 cm Round Table plus 2 Elli Chairs
bistro-table-sets.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Sunshine round outdoor bistro table and chair set. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints and designed in a style to represent rays of sunshine. 

This set comprises the generously sized 100cm diameter table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

This beautiful bistro table set is perfect for a patio area, small suntrap corner of the garden, or even your balcony. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

bistro-tables-collection.Name: Sunshine 100 cm Round Table plus 2 Elli Chairs
bistro-tables-collection.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Sunshine round outdoor bistro table and chair set. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints and designed in a style to represent rays of sunshine. 

This set comprises the generously sized 100cm diameter table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

This beautiful bistro table set is perfect for a patio area, small suntrap corner of the garden, or even your balcony. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

bistro-tables-collection.Name: Rosa Table plus 2 Viking Chairs
bistro-tables-collection.Body: The Rosa Table bistro set might be compact but is full of unique design with striking Viking chairs.

pepe-garden-chair-covers.Collection: Covers for Pepe Garden Chairs and Benches
pepe-garden-chair-covers.Name: Cover for Adirondack Chair
pepe-garden-chair-covers.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Adirondack Chair.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

pepe-garden-swing-covers.Name: Cover for Lilli Swing without Canopy
pepe-garden-swing-covers.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Lilli Swing without a canopy frame. 

The swing cover has a velcro edged 'door panel' that can be rolled up so that you may sit happily in the rain. 

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Elli Chair - Static Model
elli-chair-collection.Body:
This traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors.  The classic design has a timeless appeal. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. 

This model can be used in conjunction with the Carita Bridge, between 2 chairs to make an outdoor loveseat.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Elli Chair with Flipleg
elli-chair-collection.Body:
This traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors.  The classic design has a timeless appeal. The 'flip-leg' feature provides for two seating positions. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair, while the reclined position is more suitable for sitting back in the sunshine. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Elli High Back Chair with Flip Leg
elli-chair-collection.Body:
This high back version of our traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The classic design has a timeless appeal. The 'flip-leg' feature provides for two seating positions. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair, while the reclined position is more suitable for sitting back in the sunshine. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. 

The pictures show the chair being used with the Carita Bridge, which may be purchased separately.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Elli Cushion
elli-chair-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke cushion perfectly designed to fit the Elli Chair Collection.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Carita Bridge
elli-chair-collection.Body: Turn your Elli chairs into a loveseat with the versatile Carita Bridge. Alternatively use this item with just one of our Elli Chairs and slide across both arms to create a table for your laptop or your afternoon tea and cake.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Steamer Attachment for Elli Chair
elli-chair-collection.Body:
This is the optional footrest for our Elli Chair. Traditionally, it is also known as a steamer piece. Put your feet up and enjoy your moment in the sun.

The footrest can be fitted at a slope to lightly support your legs, or raised using it’s flip-legs to transform the chair into a full recliner.

elli-chair-collection.Name: Cover for Elli Chair
elli-chair-collection.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Elli Chair.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

swing-seats-porch.Name: Terassi 3 Seat Garden Swing
swing-seats-porch.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this swing seat is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The swing is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area. The side shelves provide the perfect space to rest your refreshments. The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option, high back option, canopy frame and mesh or all of the above. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

swing-seats-porch.Name: High Back Option for Terassi Swing
swing-seats-porch.Body:
The high back option for the Terassi Swing, extends the back support section of the seat to a height that you can rest your head. Easily attachable, this piece extends the whole width of the seat. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable. There are specific high back cushions available, giving the swing seat a distinctly regal look and feel. One high back cushion extends the length of the seat or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

swing-seats-porch.Name: Canopy Frame and Mesh Canopy for Terassi Swing
swing-seats-porch.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your canopy will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Diffuse the sunlight beautifully during those hot summer days with the addition of the canopy frame and mesh, specifically designed for the Terassi garden swing. 

The canopy consists of the removable wooden frame that fits snugly onto the swing frame plus the mesh canopy available in the following colours: Spruce Green, Navy Blue, Black, and Natural.

The canopy itself it is PVC coated polypropylene, hard-wearing, non-rot, non-fade, non-mildew. It can safely be left outside all year round and can be cleaned with soapy water and a hose.

swing-seats-porch.Name: Footrest for Terassi Swing
swing-seats-porch.Body:
The footrest for the Lilli or Terassi Swing, extends the seat section from the front out further so that you are able to rest your lower legs adding that extra touch of luxury to your swinging experience. 

Designed to hook onto your Pepe swing seat, the footrest is easily movable and can be attached to either side of your swing and removed when not in use without additional fittings. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable or why not go for the full affect and add the high back option as well. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

lilli-swing-collection.Name: Lilli  Swing Two Seat Cushion
lilli-swing-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke full-width cushion designed to add extra comfort and colour to your Lilli Swing.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke full-width cushion designed to add extra comfort and colour to your Lilli Swing.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

lilli-swing-collection.Name: High Back Option for Lilli Swing
lilli-swing-collection.Body:
The high back option for the Lilli Swing, extends the back support section of the seat to a height that you can rest your head. Easily attachable, this piece extends the whole width of the seat. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable. There are specific high back cushions available, giving the swing seat a distinctly regal look and feel. One high back cushion extends the length of the seat or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

lilli-swing-collection.Name: Footrest for Lilli Swing
lilli-swing-collection.Body:
The footrest for the Lilli or Terassi Swing, extends the seat section from the front out further so that you are able to rest your lower legs adding that extra touch of luxury to your swinging experience. 

Designed to hook onto your Pepe swing seat, the footrest is easily movable and can be attached to either side of your swing and removed when not in use without additional fittings. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable or why not go for the full affect and add the high back option as well. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

lilli-swing-collection.Name: Cover for Lilli Swing with Canopy
lilli-swing-collection.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Lilli Swing with a canopy frame in place. 

The swing cover has a velcro edged 'door panel' that can be rolled up so that you may sit happily in the rain. 

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

Note that the pictures below are actually of our larger Terassi 3 seat swing - the principle is the same.

lilli-swing-collection.Name: Pair of Scatter Cushions
lilli-swing-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Mix and match our small scatter cushions to add a pop of colour to your garden furniture.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

margot-outdoor-round-table-and-chairs-di.Collection: Margot Outdoor Round Table and Chairs Dining Sets
margot-outdoor-round-table-and-chairs-di.Name: Margot 156 cm Round Table plus 6 Elli Chairs
margot-outdoor-round-table-and-chairs-di.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Margot round outdoor dining table and chair set. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints.

This set comprises the 1.56 m diameter table complete with six of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

margot-round-tables.Name: Sunshine 100 cm Round Table
margot-round-tables.Body:
Sit down for a lovely outdoor meal with our Sunshine outdoor dining table.

With its sunray design and intertwining legs, this occasional table is compact and delicate.

Comfortably seating 2 to 3 people, the sunshine table balances design and practicality for an aesthetic outdoor dining table. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

most-popular.Name: Lilli 2 Seat Garden Swing
most-popular.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this swing seat is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The swing is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area. The side shelves provide the perfect space to rest your refreshments. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option, high back option, canopy frame and mesh or all of the above. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

most-popular.Name: Rowena Rocking Sunbed - Single
most-popular.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Rowena Sunbed features a special curve in the lower spine area to support the lumbar region comfortably. If you prefer to sit upright without rocking, two wedges come with the sunbed that slot in behind the side rails to hold it still. You could pair the Rowena Sunbed with our Pirkho Table which is the perfect height for your refreshments whilst lounging. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

most-popular.Name: Adirondack Chair
most-popular.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this traditional style Adirondack chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The classic Adirondack design has a timeless appeal. The flat arms double as miniature side tables for resting your refreshments. 

There is an interesting history to these chairs, the design having originated in the early 1900s in the Adirondack Hills, New York State. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Adirondack chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option. The Adirondack Stool / Coffee table is another wonderful addition to match perfectly with your chairs.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

most-popular.Name: Elli Chair with Flipleg
most-popular.Body:
This traditional style wooden garden chair is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors.  The classic design has a timeless appeal. The 'flip-leg' feature provides for two seating positions. The upright position makes it ideal as a dining chair, while the reclined position is more suitable for sitting back in the sunshine. The profiled shape gives support in the lumbar region of the back, which combines with the roll shape at the front of the seat giving extra comfort. 

This piece has undergone extensive testing for the ergonomics and solid form of construction and has received a FIRA Ergonomics Excellence Award. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Elli chair all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your chair to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

nojata-sunbed.Name: Nojata Sunbed Lounger
nojata-sunbed.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days.

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Nojata Sunbed Lounger comes with two wheels for ease of moving it ensuring you stay in the sun throughout the day and a small removable refreshment shelf that hooks onto the side. The adjustable back rest has three upright settings as well as lying completely flat. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

nojata-sunbed.Name: Nojata Mattress
nojata-sunbed.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A deluxe sun lounger cushion designed to fit the Nojata Sunbed.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

pepe-garden-furniture-covers.Name: Cover for Lilli Swing with Canopy
pepe-garden-furniture-covers.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Lilli Swing with a canopy frame in place. 

The swing cover has a velcro edged 'door panel' that can be rolled up so that you may sit happily in the rain. 

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

Note that the pictures below are actually of our larger Terassi 3 seat swing - the principle is the same.

riku-rocking-chairs.Name: Riku Single Rocker
riku-rocking-chairs.Body:
Relax on our Riku Single Wooden Rocker in your garden or on your patio. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

The rocker rails are spring loaded for an absolute effortless rock so that you can just sit back, completely relax, and enjoy the view. If you fancy sitting still for a change, the seat can be kept still using the two wedges provided under the rocker rails.  The Carita bridge can be used with the Riku in the still position and be slide over the two arms to create a reading or eating station. 

The high back of the Riku allows you to rest your head and shoulders back into the chair for unrivalled comfort. 

Pictured next to the Riku is our Pirkho table. This table is the perfect height for our Riku and can be purchased separately. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

riku-rocking-chairs.Name: Riku Double Rocker
riku-rocking-chairs.Body:
Relax on our Riku Double Wooden Rocker in your garden or on your patio. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

The rocker rails are spring loaded for an absolute effortless rock so that you can just sit back, completely relax, and enjoy the view. If you fancy sitting still for a change, the seat can be kept still using the two wedges provided under the rocker rails. 

The high back of the Riku allows you to rest your head and shoulders back into the chair for unrivalled comfort. 

The Riku Double Rocker will comfortably seat at least 2 adults. 

Pictured next to the Riku is our Pirkho table. This table is the perfect height for our Riku and can be purchased separately.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

riku-rocking-chairs.Name: Riku Single Rocker Cushion
riku-rocking-chairs.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A comfortable cushion perfectly designed for the Riku Rocking Chair.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

rosa-table.Name: Rosa Table plus 2 Viking Chairs
rosa-table.Body: The Rosa Table bistro set might be compact but is full of unique design with striking Viking chairs.

rosa-table.Name: Rosa Table
rosa-table.Body: The Rosa Table is a unique, smaller style bistro table solidly constructed from Scandinavian Redwood.

rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Name: Rowena Rocking Sunbed - Double
rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Rowena Sunbed features a special curve in the lower spine area to support the lumbar region comfortably. If you prefer to sit upright without rocking, two wedges come with the sunbed that slot in behind the side rails to hold it still. You could pair the Rowena Sunbed with our Pirkho Table which is the perfect height for your refreshments whilst lounging.

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Name: Rowena Rocking Sunbed - Single
rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Rowena Sunbed features a special curve in the lower spine area to support the lumbar region comfortably. If you prefer to sit upright without rocking, two wedges come with the sunbed that slot in behind the side rails to hold it still. You could pair the Rowena Sunbed with our Pirkho Table which is the perfect height for your refreshments whilst lounging. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Name: Rowena Sunbed Mattress
rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke cushion designed to hug the curves of the Rowena Sunbed.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Name: Cover for Rowena Single Recliner
rowena-rocking-sunbeds.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Rowena Single Rocker.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

serena-double-swing-bed.Name: Serena Swinging Day Bed
serena-double-swing-bed.Body:
The Serena Double Day bed is an impressive statement piece of outdoor furniture.

The ultimate in relaxation, our day bed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days or a cosy up under the night sky.

Optional extras include a fixed canopy, a full double mattress, and scatter cushions in a range of colours to add your own unique style.

serena-double-swing-bed.Name: Pair of Large Scatter Cushions
serena-double-swing-bed.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Add a splash of colour and comfort with a pair of large scatter cushions.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

small-garden-tables.Name: Pirkho Table / Footstool
small-garden-tables.Body:
The Pirkho Table / Footstool has many uses, it can be used as a footstool, side table, or even as additional seating.  With its curved edge design, our Pirkho table compliments many of the products in the Pepe range.

Expertly manufactured In Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the video we have created. 

This table can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years.

small-garden-tables.Name: Adirondack Stool / Coffee Table
small-garden-tables.Body: The perfect accompanying accessory for the Adirondack Chair Collection, this adaptable piece can either be used as a coffee table or a foot stool.

small-garden-tables.Name: Rosa Table
small-garden-tables.Body: The Rosa Table is a unique, smaller style bistro table solidly constructed from Scandinavian Redwood.

stella-recliner.Name: Stella Bench Recliner
stella-recliner.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Stella is a fantastic all-rounder, in different positions it can be used as day bed, recliner and sunbed. This design enables you to either sit normally as on a bench, or to lean back into the high arms and face each other, or both ends can be reclined to a nearly flat setting, and it becomes a day bed or sunbed. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

stella-recliner.Name: Stella Bench Recliner Cushion
stella-recliner.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Add extra comfort to the statement Stella Recliner with a bespoke cushion designed to perfectly fit and contour the angles of this individual piece.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

stella-recliner.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Stella Bench

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

table-and-chair-sets.Name: Amelia 100 x 100 cm Square Table with 2 Elli Chairs
table-and-chair-sets.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Amelia square outdoor dining table. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. 

Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This set comprises the 1 x 1 m table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created. 

This table and chair set can be left outside all year with minimal maintenance. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase.

table-and-chair-sets.Name: Sunshine 100 cm Round Table plus 2 Elli Chairs
table-and-chair-sets.Body:
Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Sunshine round outdoor bistro table and chair set. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints and designed in a style to represent rays of sunshine. 

This set comprises the generously sized 100cm diameter table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

This beautiful bistro table set is perfect for a patio area, small suntrap corner of the garden, or even your balcony. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

Enjoy dining al fresco with our classic Sunshine round outdoor bistro table and chair set. Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints and designed in a style to represent rays of sunshine. 

This set comprises the generously sized 100cm diameter table complete with two of either our Elli Static chairs or Elli flip leg chairs, with profiled lumber support. The flip leg chairs have the capability to be set to a reclined position as well as the upright dining position whereas the static chairs are set in the upright dining position only. In the centre of the table is a 50mm parasol hole. 

This beautiful bistro table set is perfect for a patio area, small suntrap corner of the garden, or even your balcony. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Terassi 3 Seat Garden Swing
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this swing seat is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. The swing is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area. The side shelves provide the perfect space to rest your refreshments. The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option, high back option, canopy frame and mesh or all of the above. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Terassi 3 Seat Garden Swing - Seat Only
terassi-swing-collection.Variant Name: Terassi Swing Seat Only 2.45 Metre Chains
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
Designed for relaxation, this swing seat is perfect for sitting and enjoying the outdoors. 

The swing is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden, patio, or porch area. The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The swing seat includes a pair of stainless steel chains enabling you to hang the seat from a suitable place. Please choose the length of chain required.

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable, or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option, the high back option, or even both. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created.

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

If you require custom chain lengths, please contact us directly.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Cover for Terassi Swing with Canopy
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Terassi Swing with a canopy frame in place. 

The swing cover has a velcro edged 'door panel' that can be rolled up so that you may sit happily in the rain. 

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Canopy Frame and Mesh Canopy for Terassi Swing
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your canopy will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Diffuse the sunlight beautifully during those hot summer days with the addition of the canopy frame and mesh, specifically designed for the Terassi garden swing. 

The canopy consists of the removable wooden frame that fits snugly onto the swing frame plus the mesh canopy available in the following colours: Spruce Green, Navy Blue, Black, and Natural.

The canopy itself it is PVC coated polypropylene, hard-wearing, non-rot, non-fade, non-mildew. It can safely be left outside all year round and can be cleaned with soapy water and a hose.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Terassi Swing Three Seat Cushion
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A bespoke full-width cushion with ties designed to add extra comfort and colour to your Terassi Swing.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: High Back Option for Terassi Swing
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
The high back option for the Terassi Swing, extends the back support section of the seat to a height that you can rest your head. Easily attachable, this piece extends the whole width of the seat. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable. There are specific high back cushions available, giving the swing seat a distinctly regal look and feel. One high back cushion extends the length of the seat or why not go for the full affect and add the footrest option.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Footrest for Terassi Swing
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
The footrest for the Lilli or Terassi Swing, extends the seat section from the front out further so that you are able to rest your lower legs adding that extra touch of luxury to your swinging experience. 

Designed to hook onto your Pepe swing seat, the footrest is easily movable and can be attached to either side of your swing and removed when not in use without additional fittings. 

The swing seat is solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of sitting in your Pepe Swing Seat all the more enjoyable or why not go for the full affect and add the high back option as well. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

terassi-swing-collection.Name: Pair of Scatter Cushions
terassi-swing-collection.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Mix and match our small scatter cushions to add a pop of colour to your garden furniture.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.
