viking-chair-collection.Name: Viking Chair
viking-chair-collection.Body:
This unique take on a simplistic concept, the Pepe Viking chair is a vision of design and practicality.

This versatile little chair is, to our mind, a design classic. Also known as a stargazer chair due to the angle and length of the back, the chair really supports your neck while you look up at the stars! The unique and simple design consists of just two pieces, a backrest, and another smaller piece that slides through the back rest and acts as a seat. 

Easily manoeuvrable and convenient for storing, the Viking chair is a flawless balance between design and practicality.

viking-chair-collection.Name: Rosa Table plus 2 Viking Chairs
viking-chair-collection.Body: The Rosa Table bistro set might be compact but is full of unique design with striking Viking chairs.

villa-sofa-seats.Name: Villa 2 Seat Sofa Bench
villa-sofa-seats.Body:
Relax on our beautifully designed Villa 2 seat wooden bench in your garden. The flip leg attachment allows the bench to be used in an upright dining position or in a more relaxed, reclined position.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This bench would be perfectly suitable for commercial areas such as parks, public gardens, woodland areas, care homes and more. 

The Villa 2 seat bench will comfortably seat at least 2 adults.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

villa-sofa-seats.Name: Villa 3 Seat Sofa Bench
villa-sofa-seats.Body:
Relax on our beautifully designed Villa 3 seat wooden bench in your garden.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This bench would be perfectly suitable for commercial areas such as parks, public gardens, woodland areas, care homes and more. 

The Villa 3 seat bench will comfortably seat at least 3 adults.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

villa-sofa-seats.Name: Villa 160 Sofa Cushions
villa-sofa-seats.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Add colour and style to your Villa bench with this bespoke cushion.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

villa-sofa-seats.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Add colour and style to your Villa bench with this bespoke cushion.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

villa-sofa-seats.Name: Cover for Villa 160
villa-sofa-seats.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Villa 160 Bench.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

all-benches.Name: Erica Park Bench
all-benches.Body:
Relax on our beautifully designed Erica wooden bench in your garden. 

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints.

This bench would be perfectly suitable for commercial areas such as parks, public gardens, woodland areas, care homes and more. 

The Erica bench will comfortably seat at least 3 adults.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

all-benches.Name: Villa 2 Seat Sofa Bench
all-benches.Body:
Relax on our beautifully designed Villa 2 seat wooden bench in your garden. The flip leg attachment allows the bench to be used in an upright dining position or in a more relaxed, reclined position.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This bench would be perfectly suitable for commercial areas such as parks, public gardens, woodland areas, care homes and more. 

The Villa 2 seat bench will comfortably seat at least 2 adults.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

all-benches.Name: Villa 3 Seat Sofa Bench
all-benches.Body:
Relax on our beautifully designed Villa 3 seat wooden bench in your garden.

Expertly manufactured in Scandinavian Redwood from PEFC certificated sustainably sourced timber, for lifelong durability and aesthetic appeal. Robustly constructed in the traditional manner with tight fitting glued mortise and tenon joints. 

This bench would be perfectly suitable for commercial areas such as parks, public gardens, woodland areas, care homes and more. 

The Villa 3 seat bench will comfortably seat at least 3 adults.

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided, or watch the videos we have created.

all-benches.Name: Villa 120 Sofa Cushions
all-benches.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Add colour and style to your Villa bench with this bespoke cushion.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

all-benches.Body:

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.

Note that the pictures below are actually of our larger Villa 160 Bench - the principle is the same.

all-recliners.Name: Rowena Rocking Sunbed - Single
all-recliners.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Rowena Sunbed features a special curve in the lower spine area to support the lumbar region comfortably. If you prefer to sit upright without rocking, two wedges come with the sunbed that slot in behind the side rails to hold it still. You could pair the Rowena Sunbed with our Pirkho Table which is the perfect height for your refreshments whilst lounging. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come.  

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

all-recliners.Name: Stella Bench Recliner
all-recliners.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days. 

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Stella is a fantastic all-rounder, in different positions it can be used as day bed, recliner and sunbed. This design enables you to either sit normally as on a bench, or to lean back into the high arms and face each other, or both ends can be reclined to a nearly flat setting, and it becomes a day bed or sunbed. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. 

All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

all-recliners.Name: Nojata Sunbed Lounger
all-recliners.Body:
Designed for relaxation, our sunbed is perfect for unwinding and enjoying the sun on those warm summer days.

Our sunbed is a beautiful and striking piece of furniture which will look fantastic as the focal centrepiece in any garden or patio area and are the ultimate in garden relaxation. 

The sunbed is a solid structure crafted using traditional precision joinery methods that can withstand daily usage for many years and will not break or become brittle over time. 

The Nojata Sunbed Lounger comes with two wheels for ease of moving it ensuring you stay in the sun throughout the day and a small removable refreshment shelf that hooks onto the side. The adjustable back rest has three upright settings as well as lying completely flat. 

Our range of fabulous and comfortable cushions will make the experience of lounging in your Pepe Sunbed all the more enjoyable. 

Some easy assembly is necessary, following the instructions provided or watch the video we have created. 

Made from long lasting, slow grown, Scandinavian redwood, you can expect your swing to be in position for many years to come. 

To keep it in perfect condition, apply a coat of our Furniture Protector every couple of years. We supply you with a complementary tin with your purchase. All of our furniture is PEFC certified sustainable.

all-recliners.Name: Nojata Mattress
all-recliners.Body:
Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

A deluxe sun lounger cushion designed to fit the Nojata Sunbed.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

Please select a colour to show our current in stock availability. In the event that the availability shows zero, you may still select the colour to place your order. Your cushion will be made to order and sent directly. Please note this can take up to fourteen days.

Mix and match our small scatter cushions to add a pop of colour to your garden furniture.

The cushion fabric is Olefin (100% polyester), it is as soft as cotton drill and is non rot, non fade and fully resistant to mildew. 

The filling is polyester fibre which does not hold water allowing it to dry quickly. Spots can be washed with warm soapy water and rinsed by hose or if needed the cushion can be dry cleaned.

This cushion is for outdoor use only.

all-recliners.Name: Cover for Nojata Sunbed
all-recliners.Body:
A waterproof and breathable made-to-measure cover designed to fit the Nojata Sunbed.

Made from strong 750 denier polyester fabric with sealed seams, eyelets, and a draw cord around the base.

Available in five colours. Navy Blue is shown.

Because this is a made to order product, there will be a period of up to six weeks after placing your order before the product is delivered.
